name: Art Crosswalks
short_description: Design and paint “Art Crosswalks,” for example between Notre Dame Avenue and Howard Street. Paint fun, eye-catching crosswalk art.
organization: City of South Bend: Board of Public Works
description: Design and paint “Art Crosswalks,” for example between Notre Dame Avenue and Howard Street. Paint fun, eye-catching crosswalk art.

name: Fire Hydrant Painting
short_description: Paint Bicentennial Soldier Fire Hydrants around historic South Bend and residential areas. Design is provided, but still calls for creativity!
organization: City of South Bend: Board of Public Works
description: Paint Bicentennial Soldier Fire Hydrants around historic South Bend and residential areas. Design is provided, but still calls for creativity!

name: Labeling Storm Drains
short_description: Label the storm drains so that less waste is dumped into our waterways!
organization: City of South Bend: Board of Public Works
description: Label the storm drains so that less waste is dumped into our waterways!

name: Photo Essay: Celebrate SB 150
short_description: Use your smart phone cameras to capture pictures of your team, natural scenes around South Bend, public art, architectural highlights, and anything else around the city (you get the idea).
organization: City of South Bend: Board of Public Works
description: Use your smart phone cameras to capture pictures of your team, natural scenes around South Bend, public art, architectural highlights, and anything else around the city (you get the idea). Try snapping a shot of a building on campus, or trademark spots around South Bend, such as the Studebaker National Museum.

name: Vintage Green (Exterior)
short_description: Assist Indiana Landmarks in prepping a home at 222 Chapin Street for rehabilitation. Volunteers will remove the vinyl and fiber-board siding from the exterior of the house.
description: Assist Indiana Landmarks in prepping a home at 222 Chapin Street for rehabilitation. Volunteers will remove the vinyl and fiber-board siding from the exterior of the house.

This project will involve the use of hammers and pry bars to take off the siding and wheelbarrows to transport the siding away from the house site. Indiana Landmarks revitalizes communities, reconnects us to our heritage, and saves meaningful places.
Visit www.indianalandmarks.org to learn more.

name: Keeping a Senior Citizen Living at Home
short_description: REAL Services assists seniors with the goal to allow them to live in the comfort of their home. This gentleman lives on 40 acres and we need volunteers to spruce up his landscaping!
description: REAL Services assists seniors with the goal to allow them to live in the comfort of their home. This gentleman lives on 40 acres and we need volunteers to spruce up his landscaping!

name: Vintage Green (Interior)
short_description: Assist Indiana Landmarks in prepping a home at 222 Chapin Street for rehabilitation. Volunteers will remove the vinyl and fiber-board siding from the exterior of the house.
description: Assist Indiana Landmarks in prepping a home at 222 Chapin Street for rehabilitation. Volunteers will engage in interior demolition to remove plaster, lathe, and drywall from certain interior walls.

This project will involve the use of hammers, sledge hammers and pry bars as well as brooms and scoop shovels to bag the material and haul it out of the house. Indiana Landmarks revitalizes communities, reconnects us to our heritage, and saves meaningful places.
Visit www.indianalandmarks.org to learn more.

name: Monarch Butterfly Waystation
short_description: This project is a collaboration with the Notre Dame Center for Arts and Culture. Volunteers will lay the groundwork for the Monarch Butterfly Waystation.
description: This project is a collaboration with the Notre Dame Center for Arts and Culture. Volunteers will lay the groundwork for the Monarch Butterfly Waystation.

Activities involve removing grass, installing metal edging for the outline of the garden, and adding compost to the garden. Volunteers will also help clean up Unity Garden boxes. The Center's vision is to provide distinctly premier educational opportunities and inspiration via the creation and appreciation of art, the study of cultures, and community engagement.
Find out more at artsandculture.nd.edu.

name: Rebuilding Together
short_description: On two April Saturdays each year, approximately 1,000 skilled and unskilled volunteers join together to make repairs to about 20 homes in a selected St. Joseph County neighborhood.
description: On two April Saturdays each year, approximately 1,000 skilled and unskilled volunteers join together to make repairs to about 20 homes in a selected St. Joseph County neighborhood. All repairs are completed at no cost to the homeowner.
Learn more about Rebuilding Together at www.rtsjc.org.

Note: Rebuilding Together begins before all other projects on this day. Volunteers will be picked up on Notre Dame's campus at 7:45 AM and will receive breakfast at the Rebuilding Together control center.

name: Mural Paintings
short_description: The Robinson Community Learning Center will be designing 4 new murals to be painted on Back the Bend day. The murals will be stenciled before the day of the event.
description: The Robinson Community Learning Center will be designing 4 new murals to be painted on Back the Bend day. The murals will be stenciled before the day of the event. The RCLC, located on North Eddy Street, is an off-campus educational initiative that was started in 2001 by the President’s Office at the University of Notre Dame in partnership with Northeast Neighborhood residents of South Bend.
Learn more about the Robinson Community Learning Center and its mission at rclc.nd.edu.
Note: This project does not begin until 11:30 AM, but volunteers are still welcome at the 8:30 AM Kick-Off.

name: Barrel and Table Painting
short_description: Volunteers, stationed at the Parks Maintenance Garage, will paint picnic tables and metal trash barrels for the upcoming season.
description: Volunteers, stationed at the Parks Maintenance Garage, will paint picnic tables and metal trash barrels for the upcoming season. Bright-colored or patterned tables and barrel add character to the average park parking lot.

name: Howard Park Landscaping
short_description: Volunteers will plan flowerbeds in Howard Park in preparation for South Bend's 150th Birthday celebration on Memorial Day Weekend.
description: Volunteers will plan flowerbeds in Howard Park in preparation for South Bend's 150th Birthday celebration on Memorial Day Weekend.
Learn more about Howard Park Recreation Center and activities that have occurred there in the past at sbpark.org/parks/howard-park/hp-recreation-center/.

name: Howard Park Mural
short_description: A Notre Dame student group is designing a new mural that will be stenciled for Back the Bend. Volunteers will paint and finish the mural on the day of the event.
description: A Notre Dame student group is designing a new mural that will be stenciled for Back the Bend. Volunteers will paint and finish the mural on the day of the event.

name: Playground Maintenance
short_description: Helping set up playground equipment and sprucing up the playground area for kids at El Campito.
description: Helping set up playground equipment and sprucing up the playground area for kids at El Campito.

name: Rum Village
short_description: Help rake and finish clean up of Rum Village Park so it can be enjoyed during the spring and summer seasons.
description: Help rake and finish clean up of Rum Village Park so it can be enjoyed during the spring and summer seasons. Rum Village Park is a nature center, home to diverse wildlife, that offers civilians mountain biking trails, hiking trails, and picnic pavilions.
Learn more about the park at sbpark.org/parks/rum-village-park/.

name: Gardening
short_description: Planting in Unity Gardens. Unity Gardens is a sustainable local food system that aims to provide fresh, healthy food for anyone, and bring diverse people together.
description: Planting in Unity Gardens. Unity Gardens is a sustainable local food system that aims to provide fresh, healthy food for anyone, and bring diverse people together.
Visit <a href="http://theunitygardens.org">theunitygardens.org for more information.

name: Heavy Lifting
short_description: Skip your daily workout and help Unity Gardens redistribute the dirt from a large dirt pile on one of its sites. The owners say, “If you want a good workout, this one is for you.”
description: Skip your daily workout and help Unity Gardens redistribute the dirt from a large dirt pile on one of its sites. The owners say, “If you want a good workout, this one is for you.”

name: Mulching Pathways
short_description: Mulching pathways in the garden. Unity Gardens loves to see fresh looking paths in their gardens early in the year. These pathways define the garden and start the season off right.
description: Mulching pathways in the garden. Unity Gardens loves to see fresh looking paths in their gardens early in the year. These pathways define the garden and start the season off right.

name: Neighborhood Gateway Project
short_description: The Neighborhood Gateway Project is a new area being built to offer a shaded place for community picnics, and serve as a bus stop. Volunteers will build the block raised beds around the area, fill them with soil, and plant them.
description: The Neighborhood Gateway Project is a new area being built to offer a shaded place for community picnics, and serve as a bus stop. Volunteers will build the block raised beds around the area, fill them with soil, and plant them.

name: Underground Greenhouse
short_description: Unity Gardens is currently constructing a new underground greenhouse. Volunteers will assist in dirt backfilling the greenhouse behind its walls.
description: Unity Gardens is currently constructing a new underground greenhouse. Volunteers will assist in dirt backfilling the greenhouse behind its walls.

name: Kelly Park Clean Up
short_description: SB Parks and Recreation classifies Kelly Park as a Block Park, containing a playground, picnic tables, and two basketball hoops. This project will involve cleaning up brush around the fence line of the park.
organization: Northeast Neighborhood Council, Neighborhood Resources Connection
description: SB Parks and Recreation classifies Kelly Park as a Block Park, containing a playground, picnic tables, and two basketball hoops. This project will involve cleaning up brush around the fence line of the park. By doing so, volunteers will be helping upkeep the park for South Bend residents living in the immediate vicinity.

name: Quigley Pocket Park Clean Up
short_description: Quigley Pocket Park is a pocket park at the corner of Notre Dame Avenue and South Bend Avenue that the city maintains out of courtesy. Volunteers will contribute to this maintenance by raking around the park and cleaning up its flower beds.
description: Quigley Pocket Park is a pocket park at the corner of Notre Dame Avenue and South Bend Avenue that the city maintains out of courtesy. Volunteers will contribute to this maintenance by raking around the park and cleaning up its flower beds.

name: Bowman Creek Clean-Up
short_description: A few blocks west of Riley High School and right next to the Crooked Ewe Brewery, students will help cleanup the mouth of Bowman Creek--stretching from St. Joseph to Carroll Street.
organization: City of South Bend: Public Works Department
description: A few blocks west of Riley High School and right next to the Crooked Ewe Brewery, students will help cleanup the mouth of Bowman Creek--stretching from St. Joseph to Carroll Street.

The University of Notre Dame, in collaboration with the City of South Bend, is currently carrying out a plan to restore Bowman Creek, a two-mile long tributary, from the significant pollution that has accumulated over the years.
To learn more about the restoration project visit www3.nd.edu/~bowman/.

name: Historic Leeper Park Garden
short_description: Leeper Park is undergoing a collaborative effort to build a garden with the community. Our volunteers will lay brick on two small patios that will serve as sitting areas by the gardens. There will also be work on irrigation systems and garden maintenance.
organization: City of South Bend: Board of Public Works & The Department of Parks & Recreation
description: Leeper Park is undergoing a collaborative effort to build a garden with the community. Our volunteers will lay brick on two small patios that will serve as sitting areas by the gardens. There will also be work on irrigation systems and garden maintenance.

name: Mishwaka Avenue Clean Up
short_description: Volunteers will participate in this annual cleanup and more volunteers means reducing the total cleanup time. visit www.riverparksouthbend.com to learn more about South Bend's River Park Neighborhood.
description: Every spring, members of the River Park Business Association get together on a Saturday morning in April or May and walk Mishawaka Avenue from Logan Street to Farmer's Market collecting all that winter has left behind along the curbs and in front of our businesses. The River Park Business Association could definitely use some help carrying out the clean up this year!

Volunteers will participate in this annual cleanup and more volunteers means reducing the total cleanup time. visit www.riverparksouthbend.com to learn more about South Bend's River Park Neighborhood.

name: SB150 Downtown Flowerbowl Rejuvenation
short_description: Volunteers are needed to remove the existing soil in the downtown flowerbowls and replace it with new soil. This project is being hosted by SB150, to kick off the Serve South Bend program.
description: Volunteers are needed to remove the existing soil in the downtown flowerbowls and replace it with new soil. This project is being hosted by SB150, to kick off the Serve South Bend program.
(Meeting location: Main and Western parking lot)

name: Colfax Bridge Mural
short_description: The design is underway! Volunteers will paint and finish the South Bend-inspired mural on the day of the event.
description: The design is underway! Volunteers will paint and finish the South Bend-inspired mural on the day of the event.
(Meeting location: Main and Western parking lot)

name: Packaging Boxes to Revitalize St. Joseph County
short_description: Rebuilding Together helps revitalize communities through assisting residents with their personal and professional lives. This event will include the packaging of supplies at their warehouse that will be used for the Skilled Trades Day and Community Volunteer Build Day.
description: Rebuilding Together helps revitalize communities through assisting residents with their personal and professional lives. This event will include the packaging of supplies at their warehouse that will be used for the Skilled Trades Day and Community Volunteer Build Day.
(Meeting location: Main and Western parking lot)

name: Riverwalk Clean-up
short_description: This is an opportunity for volunteers to do some spring cleaning along the Riverwalk, by removing trash and debris from along the trail.
description: This is an opportunity for volunteers to do some spring cleaning along the Riverwalk, by removing trash and debris from along the trail.
(Meeting location: Seitz Park)
